actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit or deduction for contributions made for the purpose of influencing the passage of State or local referendums and initiatives.

summary.text: Allows a tax credit or deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for contributions made for the purpose of influencing the passage of State or local referendums and initiatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit or deduction for contributions made for the purpose of influencing the passage of State or local referendums and initiatives.
